==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|てい|か|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From ''tei'' ([[定]], [[fixed]]) + ''ka'' ([[価]], [[monetary]] [[value]])

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ていか}}
# [[fixed]] [[price]], [[set]] price, [[list]] price, [[regular]] price, [[established]] price (as opposed to a price after discount)
#* '''定価'''で[[売る]]
#*: '''ていか'''でうる
#*: '''''teika''' de uru''
#*: Sell at a '''fixed price'''
